title: Ranking for Scientific Literature (Web of Science)
description: Rank most influential researchers & opinion leaders in the scientific community

input.name: quid_KOL_webofscience_input
input.description: CSV export from Quid Opus network of Web of Science data

output.name: quid_webofscience_output
output.description: Ranked list of key opinion leaders based on metrics such as number of publications, frequency of citation, co-authorship, and breadth of influence

title: KOL Ranking for News & Blogs
description: Rank most influential opinion leaders mentioned in the media

input.name: quid_KOL_news_input
input.description: CSV​​ export ​​from​​ Quid​​ news and blogs network

output.name: quid_KOL_rankings_news_output
output.description: Ranked list of key opinion leaders based on metrics such as number of mentions, social engagement, re-publication count, and breadth of influence

title: Cluster​​ Tightness​​ &​​ Cluster​​ Adjacency​​ Scores
description: ​​​Cluster​​ Tightness’ ​​​calculates ​​how​​ ‘tight’​​ (focused ​​on​​ one​​ topic)​ ​or ‘dispersed’​​ (focused​​ on​ ​multiple​​ topics) ​​a​​ cluster ​​is. ‘Tightness’​​ score​​ =​​# ​​of ​​intra-cluster​​ links ​​/​​# ​​of​​ nodes​ ​in ​​that ​​cluster​​​ ‘Cluster​​ Adjacency’​​​ calculates​​ the ​​strength​​ of​ ​similarity ​​across​​ all​​ combinations of ​​cluster ​​pairs‘ Adjacency’​​ score ​​=​​#​​ of ​​actual​​ inter-cluster  ​​links​​/​​# ​​of ​​possible​​ inter-cluster ​​links

output.name: cluster_adjacency_tightness_score
output.description: Zip file containing up to 6 CSVs

title: Ranking​​ Hot ​​Startups ​​& ​​Clusters
description: Excel​​ tool ​​that ​​ranks​​ “hot” companies​​ or​​ clusters ​​based​​ on ​​a combination​​ of​ ​funding​​ metrics ​​and​​ network ​​metrics
input_description:
Input 1: CSV​​ export ​​from​​ Quid​​ companies network
Input 2: Target Event Report

output.name: HotRanking
output.description: Ranked ​​list​​ of​​ top​​ companies ​​and​​ clusters ​​based​​ on​​ metrics​​ such​​ as funding​​ details,​​ uniqueness,​​ spread ​​across​​ clusters,​​ etc.
